#Overall plots
```{r}
plots_dur <- (plot_high_dur_rptr / plot_mid_dur_rptr / plot_low_dur_rptr)
plots_dur

plots_other <- (plot_Tot_Dist_rptr/plot_freezing_dur_rptr/plot_frequency_rptr/ plot_latency_rptr)
plots_other

Overall_plot <- wrap_plots(plots_other|plots_dur) + plot_layout(guides="collect")

Overall_plot

ggsave(path = "Plots", file = "Overall_plot.jpeg", limitsize = FALSE)
```

#Systematic extraction plot
```{r}
Review <- read.csv("Systematic_Extraction.csv")

p<-ggplot(data=Review, aes(x=Endpoint, y=Count)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")+
coord_flip()+
   scale_x_discrete(labels=c("tot_dist_exploration"=expression(bold(tot_dist_exploration)), "mid_zone_dur"=expression(bold(mid_zone_dur)),
                              "low_zone_dur"=expression(bold(low_zone_dur)),"latency_high"=expression(bold(latency_high)),"high_zone_dur"=expression(bold(high_zone_dur)),"freezing_dur_or_freq"=expression(bold(freezing_dur_or_freq)),"entries_high"=expression(bold(entries_high)), parse=TRUE))+
  labs(title="Counts of zebrafish anxiety endpoints from review")
p
  
ggsave(path = "Plots", file = "Review.jpeg", limitsize = FALSE)
```
